```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(magrittr)
library(kableExtra)
```

The current schedule for the Neural Network reading group is


```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Members
members = c(
"Alessio Zakaria", "Alexander Modell","Andi Wang","Andrea Becsek","Andrew Jones",
"Anthony Lee", "Chang Zhang","Christophe Andrieu","Daniel Williams", "Hamza Alawiye",
"Henry Reeve", "Ian Gallagher", "Jack Simons", "Jennifer Chakravarty","Mark Beaumont",
"Mauro Camara Escudero","Mingxuan Yi", "Nick Whiteley", "Patrick Rubin-Delanchy","Pierre-Aurelien Gilliot",
"Robert Allison","Sam Power", "Sam Tickle", "Song Liu", "Tjun Yee Hoh", 
"Vladislav Tadic")
status =  c("SPECTATOR", "SPECTATOR", "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR", "SPECTATOR", 
            "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR", "SPECTATOR", 
            "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR", "SPECTATOR", "SPECTATOR", "PRESENTER", 
            "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", 
            "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "PRESENTER", "SPECTATOR", 
            "SPECTATOR")
presenting_members <- members[ifelse(status == "PRESENTER", T, F)]
# Date of Presentation
dates_tb1 <- seq(as.Date("2020-10-19"), as.Date("2020-12-14"), by="weeks")
dates_tb2 <- seq(as.Date("2021-02-03"), as.Date("2021-03-03"), by="weeks")
dates     <- c(dates_tb1, dates_tb2)
# Order of Presentations
index     <- c(3, 7, 14, 10, 6, 
               8, 4, 1, 2, 13, 
               9, 11, 12, 5)
names <- presenting_members[index]
# ZOOM during COVID
location <- rep("ZOOM", length(names))
schedule <- data.frame(Date=dates,Name=names, Room=location)
# upcoming WEEK
monday = "2021-02-10"
knitr::kable(schedule) %>% 
    kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "responsive")) %>% 
    row_spec(which(schedule$Date == monday), bold=F, color="white", background="#0066ff")
```
